document.full_text: after years of failures, jack kerouac's classic novel, has finally been made into a movie and those involved are just as anxious as fans about getting it right.
document.title: trepidations aside, 'on the road' becomes a movie at last
lines_and_colors: after years of failures, jack kerouac's classic novel, has finally been made into a movie and those involved are just as anxious as fans about getting it right.
